name: Silavra Creatures style [LoRA]
description:
Trained on SD1.5
my first attempt at a non-human LoRA.

Based on CG creature artwork styles, this is focused on creatures with detailed skin or fur texturing. I used this model for the preview images.

modelVersions.name: v2
modelVersions.description:
This was trained on base SD 1.5 and Trained on 188 more images.

This version has a more painterly fantasy feel so it's really your choice.

I used this model for some of the preview images. This is intended for creatures like dragons or monsters or animals so was not tested on humans.
